item.title: CAMEL-Bench: A Comprehensive Arabic LMM Benchmark
item.description: CAMEL-Bench: a new open-source benchmark rigorously evaluates Arabic LMMs across 8 diverse domains and 38 sub-domains, revealing significant room for improvement even in top models.

item.title: SMITE: Segment Me In TimE
item.description: SMITE: a new video segmentation method achieving temporally consistent, fine-grained segmentations using only a few reference images, outperforming state-of-the-art alternatives.

item.title: The Nature of Mathematical Modeling and Probabilistic Optimization Engineering in Generative AI
item.description: This paper enhances generative AI Transformer models by introducing probabilistic optimization solutions for subword encoding, hyperparameter tuning, attention mechanisms, and quantization, resulting …

item.title: Unbounded: A Generative Infinite Game of Character Life Simulation
item.description: UNBOUNDED, a generative infinite game, uses AI to create a continuously evolving character life simulation with open-ended interactions and real-time visual generation.
